bosses.name: Ranger Oakley
bosses.dialogBefore: The forest grows thick here. Can you handle its guardians?
bosses.dialogAfter: Impressive... The forest bows to you.

bosses.name: Warden Thorn
bosses.dialogBefore: None pass without proving their worth to the Warden.
bosses.dialogAfter: You have earned the forest's respect. Press onward.

bosses.name: Miner Slate
bosses.dialogBefore: These tunnels are mine. You want through? Fight for it.
bosses.dialogAfter: Tough as bedrock... Go on, the deeper veins await.

bosses.name: Foreman Basalt
bosses.dialogBefore: I forged my team in the heart of this mountain. Show me what you've got.
bosses.dialogAfter: Shattered like granite... You've earned your passage.

bosses.name: Captain Coral
bosses.dialogBefore: The swamp swallows the unprepared. Are you ready?
bosses.dialogAfter: You navigate these waters well. The depths beckon.

bosses.name: Admiral Murk
bosses.dialogBefore: From the darkest depths, I command the tides. Brace yourself.
bosses.dialogAfter: The current has shifted... You are stronger than I expected.

bosses.name: Pyro Ember
bosses.dialogBefore: The heat alone should have turned you back. Let's see if you can take more.
bosses.dialogAfter: You walked through fire and came out tempered. Respect.

bosses.name: Inferno Rex
bosses.dialogBefore: I am the eruption itself. Nothing survives my flames.
bosses.dialogAfter: Impossible... Even magma could not consume you.

bosses.name: Phantom Nyx
bosses.dialogBefore: You see shadows. I see allies. Let's find out who's afraid of the dark.
bosses.dialogAfter: The darkness whispers your name now... You have its favor.

bosses.name: Overlord Shade
bosses.dialogBefore: You've reached the end. I am the final shadow between you and the abyss.
bosses.dialogAfter: The abyss stares back... and blinks. You are truly worthy.
